name: Dragon Trader
description:
Can you buy low and sell high in this fantasy world? King Jeff thinks not!

Dragon Trader is a turn-based commerce simulation/RPG hybrid game with optimized "buy low, sell high" experience for 5-minute matches from anywhere, and can be playable with one hand in portrait orientation. Casual and roguelike RPG elements (gear management, monster fights to earn rewards, random events) have been added into the trading simulator formula to form a captivating hybrid! You'll have to choose between the tasks at hand, creating meaningful tactics or strategic choices, but each task is simple to execute, allowing experienced players to play a casual, almost idle RPG experience... until they choose to add depth through changing game length and difficulty, as well as competing in daily challenges!

Game Features:

  • 4 difficulty settings (easy, normal, hard, nightmare) and 4 game durations (20, 30, 50, 365 days). A casual or hardcore experience? You decide!

  • More than 15 enemies to interact with; avoid them, or earn gold and fame by hunting bounties for them!

  • 9 different types of goods to trade; 15 pieces of gear to put the odds in your favor, including weapons, armor, and magic spells to enhance your hero's arsenal!

  • Local and Online Leaderboards. Can YOU be the best Trader in the world?

  • Challenges that change the game every day. There are 31 of them, plus a few holiday specials — each with their own scoreboards!

  • 50 Achievements: You know you ARE a completionist!

  • Survival Mode!

  • Clean and smooth interface; trading in a fantasy RPG has never been easier!

  • Gameplay inspired by Dopewars, but improved!

  • Pixel Art style graphics with a Flat/Material design interface!

  • Unlimited longevity!

  • Extremely small app size! Only 11Mb for a small RPG you can take with you!

  • A noble King, wiser than... well... not so wise indeed! A Dragon as a loan shark! Heroes and Merchants in combat, and other instances of fantasy tropes transformed into playful humor…

And much more!

PERMISSIONS

The only permissions required for this game are those required by Google Play Games, Ads and In-App Purchases, which are internet, read phone state, find accounts on device, receive internet data, and prevent phone from going to sleep. We take privacy very seriously and we do not store or resell your personal data, and we never will.
